parsed_response.debt_incurrence: Section 4.05: General test allows debt incurrence if pro forma Senior Leverage Ratio ≤ 3.50x. Key baskets: (i) Credit Facilities up to $2,250M + greater of ($700M less Notes issued at Issue Date) or 75% of Consolidated EBITDA, plus additional amounts if First Lien Leverage Ratio ≤ 3.00x; (vi) capex/acquisition financing within 270 days of acquisition; (viii) acquired debt if pro forma Secured Leverage Ratio ≤ 6.00x; (xv) general basket: greater of $400M or 40% of Consolidated EBITDA; (xix) subordinated unsecured debt if no EoD and Secured Leverage Ratio ≤ 6.00x (must be junior to Notes, mature 91+ days after Maturity Date); (xxv) 200% of direct/indirect equity contributions; (xxvi) non-Guarantor subsidiary debt: greater of $50M or 5% of Consolidated EBITDA; (xxvii) acquisition financing if Senior Leverage Ratio ≤ 3.50x or no greater than prior period, or First Lien Leverage Ratio no greater than prior period; (xxix) junior lien secured debt if Secured Leverage Ratio ≤ 6.00x. Refinancing permitted under clause (xxii) with customary limitations.
parsed_response.restricted_payments: Section 4.06: Conditions: (A) no EoD continuing (for clause (B)(1), only payment EoD provisions apply). Builder basket (B): (1) $300M starter basket; (3) cumulative Consolidated EBITDA from Q1 2021 minus 1.70x cumulative Consolidated Interest Expense; (4) returns on post-Issue Date investments using builder capacity (capped at investment amount); (5-7) Unrestricted Subsidiary designations/proceeds/dividends; (8) Retained Declined Proceeds. Permitted baskets: (vi) management buybacks: greater of $20M or 20% of Consolidated EBITDA per year (carryforward permitted); (viii) general basket: greater of $150M or 15% of Consolidated EBITDA, plus Excluded Contribution Amount not otherwise applied; (xii) 6.0% annually of IPO net proceeds; (xiv) unlimited if Total Leverage Ratio ≤ 4.50x and no EoD. Junior Financing prepayments (Section 4.06(c)): permitted at (iv)(A) greater of $150M or 15% of Consolidated EBITDA, or using builder basket if no EoD, or Excluded Contribution Amount; (v) unlimited if Total Leverage Ratio ≤ 5.00x and no EoD.
parsed_response.asset_sales: Section 4.16: Requirements: (1) Fair Market Value; (2) for sales exceeding greater of $50M or 5% of Consolidated EBITDA, at least 75% cash consideration (excluding Permitted Asset Swaps, Sale Leasebacks, Multiplex dispositions). Application period: 450 days from receipt of Net Proceeds. Uses: repay Notes/Senior Credit Facilities/First Lien Obligations (if Collateral disposed), repay pari passu debt (with ratable treatment to Notes), or reinvest in business. Acceptable Commitment extends application period by 180 days. Excess Proceeds threshold: $100M triggers mandatory Asset Sale Offer at 100% of principal plus accrued interest. Deemed cash: assumed liabilities, securities converted within 180 days, Designated Non-Cash Consideration up to 5% of Consolidated Total Assets. Foreign Subsidiary proceeds exempt if repatriation prohibited by law or would cause material adverse tax consequence.
parsed_response.change_of_control: Section 4.11: Upon Change of Control (absent prior redemption notice), Company must offer to purchase all Notes at 101% of principal (or higher at Company's discretion) plus accrued interest. Timeline: notice within 60 days of Change of Control; Change of Control Payment Date no earlier than 20 Business Days and no later than 60 days from notice (may be delayed for conditions). Withdrawal deadline: 10 Business Days after notice. Clean-up call: if ≥90% tendered and purchased, Company may redeem remaining Notes at same price within 60 days. Third-party offer permitted if approved by Company. Offer may be conditional on Change of Control occurrence. May be combined with consent solicitation (without conditioning tender on consent).
parsed_response.liens_and_other: Section 4.07 (Liens): No liens (other than Permitted Liens) on assets securing Indebtedness unless Notes equally and ratably secured (or senior if lien secures Junior Financing). Automatic release upon Initial Lien release. Section 4.09 (Negative Pledge): No agreements limiting ability to grant liens for benefit of Holders on Notes Obligations. Carve-outs for: law, Credit Facilities documentation, Indenture, Security Documents, Permitted Receivables Financing, junior lien debt, subordinated notes, Odeon Credit Agreement, sale-leaseback debt, customary Issue Date restrictions, sale agreement restrictions, lease/license assignment restrictions, secured debt restrictions (limited to securing collateral), foreign subsidiary restrictions, JV agreements, net worth provisions. Section 4.10 (Future Guarantors): Subsidiaries guaranteeing (a) Senior Credit Facilities, (b) Existing Notes, (c) Credit Facility debt >$250M, or (d) capital markets debt >$250M must guarantee Notes within 60 days and join intercreditor agreements/Security Documents.
reasoning_steps: Step 1: Located covenant sections by extracting full PDF text and identifying page references from Table of Contents. Section 4.05 (Debt Incurrence) at line ~3170, Section 4.06 (Restricted Payments) at ~3450, Section 4.07 (Liens) at ~3800, Section 4.08-4.09 (Affiliate Transactions/Negative Pledge) at ~3850-3950, Section 4.10 (Future Guarantors) at ~4000, Section 4.11 (Change of Control) at ~4010, Section 4.16 (Asset Sales) at ~4200.

Step 2: Extracted specific ratios and basket mechanics: Senior Leverage Ratio defined as Consolidated Senior Debt / Consolidated EBITDA (Test Period); First Lien Leverage Ratio = Consolidated First Lien Debt / Consolidated EBITDA; Secured Leverage Ratio = Consolidated Secured Debt / Consolidated EBITDA; Total Leverage Ratio = Consolidated Total Net Debt / Consolidated EBITDA. Identified 'greater of' mechanics in debt baskets (clause (i), (xv), (xxvi)) combining fixed dollar amounts with EBITDA percentages. Builder basket mechanics in Section 4.06(a)(B) use cumulative EBITDA minus 1.70x interest coverage. Asset sale application period is 450 days with 180-day extension for Acceptable Commitments. Change of Control offer at 101% with 20-60 day payment window.
